thread.title: Ronnie Pickering's auctioning off his Citreon Picasso for charity
thread.title_full: Life | Ronnie Pickering's auctioning off his Citreon Picasso for charity - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: Ronnie Pickering's auctioning off his Citreon Picasso for charity
text:
If you haven't yet seen Ronnie Pickering's infamous moment of road rage, take a look below.
Pickering became an Internet sensation when he challenged a motorcyclist to a bare-knuckle match after an altercation between them in a suburban road in England. Pickering repeatedly asked the driver if he knew who he was, which in turn has become a sort-of meme now.
The bare-knuckle fighter is selling off his maroon Citreon Picasso to charity and has already amassed £65,000 in bids already. As Ronnie describes it, it is "a good runner with good tyres all round", with Pickering signing the side of the car itself.
You can bid on the car right here, with all proceeds going to the L6ve Life Charity.
Any excuse to play this again, really.
Via eBay
